segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool first, precariously balanced and reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on getting those cookies, completely unaware of how unstable that stool is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing next to him, her hand raised, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be cheering him on, not realizing the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman at the sink is completely oblivious to what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying dishes, not noticing the water overflowing or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water pouring onto the floor, and she's just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is, given the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, a stark contrast to the scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall off that stool; it looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
